content.prompt: Which of the following arguments about United States policy toward decolonization do the excerpts best support?

choices.label: It sought to encourage decolonization by withholding economic support to European nations.
It was more interested in maintaining stability in regions than in backing decolonization.
It supported decolonization efforts by providing weapons and money to nationalists.
It rejected decolonization in favor of replacing European control with American control.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
